description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Three chapters of hardcore baby stealing action!  Cut Scenes straight from the bowels of Newgrounds!  Join your Kobold compatriots in this platforming grief game.
